articles.author: Walter Murphey And His Orchestra
articles.content: Lois: It seems today that all you see is violence in movies and sex on TV. Peter: But where are those good ol' fashioned values... All: ...on which we used to rely? All: Lucky there's a Family Guy! All: Lucky there's a man who, positively can do all the thing that make us... Stewie: ...Laugh and cry! All: He's a Family Guuuuuuuuuuuuy!
articles.title: Family Guy Theme
